SELECT switches_status.id, switches_status.switch_id, switches_status.`name`, switches_status.cpu_load, switches_status.memory_used, switches_status.temp, switches_status.time_stamp, list.ip AS ip_origin, list.model, list.building, reach.reachable, reach.down_time, speed.in_speed, speed.out_speed, speed.time_stamp AS speed_time, speed.port_index, port_status.speed AS speed_max, port_status.name AS port_name, port_status.cvlan, port_status.pvlan FROM switches_status INNER JOIN switches_list AS list ON switches_status.switch_id = list.id INNER JOIN switches_reachable AS reach ON switches_status.switch_id = reach.switch_id LEFT JOIN port_speed AS speed ON switches_status.switch_id = speed.switch_id LEFT JOIN port_status ON speed.switch_id = port_status.switch_id AND speed.port_index = port_status.port_index order by list.id asc

SELECT switches_status.up_time, unix_timestamp(switches_reachable.down_time) as down_time, switches_reachable.reachable, switches_list.ip, switches_list.model, switches_status.cpu_load, switches_status.memory_used, switches_status.temp, unix_timestamp(switches_status.time_stamp) AS info_time, switches_status.`name`, switches_list.description FROM switches_list INNER JOIN switches_status ON switches_list.id = switches_status.switch_id INNER JOIN switches_reachable ON switches_list.id = switches_reachable.switch_id
